52 class LedState:
53 
54  SHUTDOWN = 1
55  HOTSPOT = 2
56  HW_ERROR = 3
57  OK = 4
58  WAIT_HOTSPOT = 5
59  PAUSE = 6

61 
62 def send_trigger_program_autorun():
63  rospy.loginfo("Trigger program autorun from button")
64  topic_name = "/niryo_robot_programs_manager_v2/execute_program_autorun"
65  try:
66  rospy.wait_for_service(topic_name, 0.1)
67  trigger = rospy.ServiceProxy(topic_name, Trigger)
68  resp = trigger()
69  return resp.status, resp.message
70  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException):
71  return CommandStatus.FAILURE, "Send trigger autorun error"
72 
73 
74 def send_reboot_motors_command():
75  rospy.loginfo("Send reboot motor command")
76  try:
77  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot/reboot_motors', timeout=0.5)
78  except rospy.ROSException:
79  pass
80  try:
81  reboot_motors = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot/reboot_motors', Trigger)
82  reboot_motors()
83  except rospy.ServiceException:
84  pass
85 
86 
87 def send_shutdown_command(learning_mode=True):
88  rospy.loginfo("SHUTDOWN")
89  activate_learning_mode(learning_mode)
90  # send_reboot_motors_command()
91  rospy.sleep(0.2)
92  rospy.loginfo("Command 'sudo shutdown now'")
93  try:
94  output = subprocess.check_output(['sudo', 'shutdown', 'now'])
95  rospy.loginfo(str(output))
96  except subprocess.CalledProcessError:
97  rospy.logwarn("Can't exec shutdown cmd")
98 
99 
100 def send_reboot_command(learning_mode=True):
101  rospy.loginfo("REBOOT")
102  activate_learning_mode(learning_mode)
103  # send_reboot_motors_command()
104  rospy.sleep(0.2)
105  rospy.loginfo("Command 'sudo reboot'")
106  try:
107  output = subprocess.check_output(['sudo', 'reboot'])
108  rospy.loginfo(str(output))
109  except subprocess.CalledProcessError:
110  rospy.logwarn("Can't exec reboot cmd")
111 
112 
113 def send_led_state(state):
114  if rospy.get_param("/niryo_robot_rpi/hardware_version") in ['ned2', 'ned3pro']:
115  return
116 
117  try:
118  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot/rpi/set_led_state', timeout=0.1)
119  except rospy.ROSException:
120  return
121 
122  try:
123  set_led = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot/rpi/set_led_state', SetInt)
124  set_led(state)
125  except rospy.ServiceException:
126  rospy.logwarn("Could not call set_led_state service")
127 
128 
129 def activate_learning_mode(activate):
130  try:
131  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot/learning_mode/activate', timeout=0.5)
132  rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot/learning_mode/activate', SetBool)(activate)
133 
134  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException) as e:
135  return False
136  return True
137 
138 
139 def auto_calibration():
140  try:
141  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot/joints_interface/calibrate_motors', timeout=0.5)
142  rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot/joints_interface/calibrate_motors', SetInt)(1)
143 
144  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException) as e:
145  return False
146  return True
147 
148 
149 def stop_robot_action():
150  # Stop current move command
151  try:
152  rospy.wait_for_service('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/stop_command', timeout=0.5)
153  stop_cmd = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_arm_commander/stop_command', Trigger)
154  stop_cmd()
155  except (rospy.ServiceException, rospy.ROSException) as e:
156  pass
157 
158 
159 def ping_i2c(bus_num, address):
160  from smbus2 import SMBus
161 
162  try:
163  bus = SMBus(bus_num)
164  except OSError:
165  return False
166 
167  try:
168  bus.read_byte(address)
169  return True
170  except IOError as e:
171  return e.args[0] == 16 # Busy but connected if error=16
172 
173 
174 def play_connected():
175  overlay_sound = rospy.ServiceProxy('/niryo_robot_sound/overlay', PlaySound)
176  overlay_sound(PlaySoundRequest(sound_name='connected.wav'))
